key.name: enabled
key.description: Master toggle for cursor highlighting

key.name: color
key.description: RGBA color value for the cursor highlight ring

key.name: rgb-enabled
key.description: Cycle through colors continuously

key.name: rgb-speed
key.description: Speed of color cycling

key.name: size
key.description: Diameter of the highlight ring in pixels

key.name: opacity
key.description: Overall transparency of the highlight (0.0 = invisible, 1.0 = opaque)

key.name: border-weight
key.description: Thickness of the highlight ring border in pixels

key.name: gap
key.description: Distance between outer and inner ring in pixels

key.name: shape
key.description: Shape of the cursor highlight

key.name: rotation
key.description: Angle of rotation in degrees (0-360)

key.name: glow
key.description: Add a soft glow around the highlight ring

key.name: corner-radius
key.description: 0=Square, 25=Squircle, 50=Circle

key.name: glow-radius
key.description: Blur radius of the glow in pixels

key.name: glow-spread
key.description: Spread radius of the glow in pixels

key.name: additional-deformations
key.description: If true, adds symmetric indentations to the shape edges.

key.name: dashed-border
key.description: If true, the inner ring will be drawn with a dashed line style.

key.name: dash-gap-size
key.description: Controls the density of the dashes. Smaller value = higher density.

key.name: use-system-accent
key.description: If true, overrides the custom color with the system accent color.

key.name: click-animations
key.description: Show ripple/directional effect when clicking

key.name: left-click-color
key.description: Color validation string (rgba)

key.name: right-click-color
key.description: Color validation string (rgba)

key.name: magnifier-enabled
key.description: Master switch for the magnifier feature

key.name: magnifier-zoom
key.description: Zoom level (1.0 - 4.0)

key.name: magnifier-key
key.description: Key to hold to activate magnifier

key.name: click-animation-mode
key.description: Style of click animation

key.name: auto-hide
key.description: Automatically hide the highlight when the cursor isn't moving

key.name: auto-hide-delay
key.description: Time in milliseconds before hiding stationary cursor

key.name: inertia-enabled
key.description: If true, cursor uses spring-damper physics. If false, it follows pointer instantly.

key.name: inertia-stiffness
key.description: Spring stiffness (Higher = Faster/Tighter follow)

key.name: inertia-smoothness
key.description: Velocity retention factor (Higher = More slippery/gliding, Lower = High friction)

key.name: spotlight-enabled
key.description: Darken screen and highlight cursor when key is held

key.name: spotlight-key
key.description: Key to hold to activate spotlight

key.name: spotlight-opacity
key.description: Darkness of the overlay

key.name: spotlight-size
key.description: Diameter of the spotlight circle
